Articles.Content:
I copy across my Hill sized chocolate chips from the cookie thread.

My Chocolate Chip Hill.

Garfield eat the giant cookie and I replace it with a hill made out of rocket parts.

My rocket parts hill

Jeb comes and takes all the rocket parts to use at his junkyard, leaving a big flat area. A circus thinks it's a perfect place to set up and does so.

My Big Top Hill.

the circus has a "freak accident" and i leverage that moment to completely lead them out of the hill.

my hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2022-01-11T01:34:03Z" title="01/11/2022 01:34  AM" data-short="2 yr">January 11, 2022</time> by iamn00b**
  
pun intended

Hill collapses.

Collapsed hill

The collapsible hill extends.

Extended Hill

I put a Limit sign on the Extended Hill.

My limited Hill

L'Hôpital comes and takes the limit.

L'Hôpital Hill

L'Hopital is for Bunnies.

Bugs Hill.

The hill is mistaken as an hospital for insects.

My Insects Hive Cluster Hill

It receives a rewrite.

Clive Cussler Hill.
Hive Hustler Chill

The hill cools (chills down).

frozen hill

I direct the solar energy onto the hill with A giant magnifying glass 

my superheated hill

Clouds.

Cool Hill

The hill is so cool that it plays Among Us.

Sus hill

EMMERGEINCY MEETINTG!q~!q!q~!q

DUN DUN DUN DUN!!!!~!qq!~Q12

NAZALASSA IS SUS, KICK'EM!~!q

\*kick sounds\*

Nazalassa was NOT the impostor

....

PANIK!q~!q!q

Panik hill

In a panic, the hill destroyed itself!

Destroyed hill

And then it was reborn out of its own ashes.

Phoenix Hill

**Edited <time datetime="2022-01-13T18:55:20Z" title="01/13/2022 06:55  PM" data-short="2 yr">January 13, 2022</time> by Scarecrow71**

Phoenix hill so fire.

Fire Hill.

There's a forest on the hill.

Forest fire hill

Rip Forest.![:sob:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/sob.png ":sob:")

Deadlands Hill

Dear Lands Hill

(thinking positive)

Dare I Land, Hill?

Yes you can.

Hill with my planetary base on

Planetary base is not neccesaary, this is KERBIN

Hill with no base
